neural_network_blackbox_distinguisher_tests(cipher, nb_samples=10000, hidden_layers=[32, 32, 32], number_of_epochs=10)¶

Warning

Tensorflow is used in this method, and currently it is not supported for Apple Silicon chip (M1).

Warning

Tensorflow is used in this method, and currently it is not supported for Apple Silicon chip (M1).
